item.title: All good coders look here, i need help with a command
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

So pretty much I’m trying to make a command
that when I type ::iceset
it automatically changes the stuff I have on
to the stuff I want

Heres what I have so far…

if (command.startsWith(“iceset”) && playerRights >= 2) {
playerEquipment[playerHat]=2643;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1731;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=3058;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=3840;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=3059;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=775;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4675;
}

Read full topic
item.source: All good coders look here, i need help with a command
